name: com.uralstech.ugemini
description:
UGemini: A C# wrapper for the Google Gemini API.

For those updating from v1.0.x: Check the changelog and go to the update notes for v1.1.0 for an update guide.

samples.description: A sample scene showing a multi-turn chat system.
A sample scene showing a function calling system.
A sample scene showing a system where Gemini responds in a specified JSON format.
A sample scene showing a token counting system using the "countTokens" endpoint.
A sample scene with a system to create, delete, retrieve, list and prompt Gemini with files stored in the File/Media API endpoints.
